com.stepstone.stepper.internal.type

Class AbstractStepperType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stepstone.stepper.internal.type.AbstractStepperType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DotsStepperType, NoneStepperType, ProgressBarStepperType, TabsStepperType

    public abstract class AbstractStepperType
extends java.lang.Object
    A base stepper type all stepper types must extend.

    • Method Detail

      • onStepSelected

        public abstract void onStepSelected(int newStepPosition,
                                    boolean userTriggeredChange)
        Called when a step gets selected as the new current step.
        Parameters:
        newStepPosition - new current step position
        userTriggeredChange - true if current step position changed as a direct result of user interaction

      • setError

        public void setError(int stepPosition,
                     @Nullable
                     VerificationError error)
        Called to set whether the stepPosition has an error or not, changing it's appearance.
        Parameters:
        stepPosition - the step to set the error
        error - error instance or null if no error

      • getErrorAtPosition

        @Nullable
public VerificationError getErrorAtPosition(int stepPosition)
        Checks if there's an error for the step.
        Parameters:
        stepPosition - the step to check for error
        Returns:
        an error for this step or null if no error
